wordArray.wordContents: These terms and conditions are related to VIRNECT products provided by Vernect Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the'Company'), and the terms and conditions of use of the products between the company and members, rights and obligations between the company and members, and other necessary matters

lists.contents: Article 2 (Effectiveness and Change of Terms and Conditions)

wordArray.wordContents: These terms and conditions are effective by posting them on the company website (https://virnect.com).

A member who agrees to these terms and is registered as a member is subject to the terms and conditions agreed upon from the time of agreement, and if there is a change in terms of terms, the terms and conditions of the change are applied from the time the change takes effect."

The company may change these terms if deemed necessary. In the event that the Terms and Conditions are changed, the Company shall set the contents and the application date of the changed Terms and Conditions, and notify the Members by posting them on the website or sending them by e-mail to the Members 7 days before the date of application. The revised terms and conditions become effective from the date of disclosure or notice."

Members who have objections to changes to these terms and conditions may stop using the product and terminate the use contract (withdrawal from membership). Even if the company has clearly announced that it intends to agree to change the terms and conditions of the revised terms in accordance with the preceding paragraph, it is deemed that the members have agreed to the terms and conditions of change if the member has not expressly expressed their intention to refuse."
If the member who uses the product does not agree to these terms and conditions and terminates the use contract, a separate refund policy will be followed."

lists.contents: Article 3 (Application of Terms and Conditions and Other Rules)

wordArray.wordContents: The company can sign a separate contract for each product depending on the product characteristics, and if the content conflicts with these terms, a separate contract takes precedence."
The terms used in these terms and conditions are as follows.

Member: A person who accesses the site operated by the company and agrees to these terms and conditions, enters into an agreement with the company, obtains an ID and password, and uses the product provided by the company. Member is distinguished between associate member and full members."
User: Refers to a group or individual registered to use the product.
ID: It means the email selected by the member for member identification and product use.
Password : It means the combination of letters and numbers selected to provide confidentiality for the ID given by the member.
Product Use Agreement : A contract that provides products that the company provides to members and any additional functions that accompany with it.
Subscription Products: Refers to products provided by the company within a fixed period of time under regular payment by members.
The Use Agreement is concluded by the person who wishes to become a member, agrees to the terms and conditions, then applies for membership and the company approves the application."

In principle, the company approves the use of the product for the application of the subscription applicant and grants a member ID. In principle, member ID cannot be changed. If you want to change due to unavoidable reasons, you must cancel the ID and get a new ID."
In the process of granting the member ID in paragraph 2, the company can proceed with the authentication process via email address entered by the member in order to verify the member's information."

In the event of any of the following reasons, the member shall immediately notify the company of the change in accordance with the email or the company's instructions and request a change in the contract immediately after the occurrence of the reason."

array.text: Changes in contact details of customers and person responsible for payments
Change of product contents (type, contract period, etc.)"
Changes to payment methods for product service fees

wordArray.wordContents: The company is not responsible for any disadvantages caused by the member not notifying the company of the changes in paragraph 1.
The Use Agreement is terminated by the termination of the member or the company under paragraphs 2 to 3.
When the members request for the termination of contract and the contract is ended, they cannot claim compensation for damages due to loss of their data."

array.text: In case of illegal use of other person's personal information, user ID and password"

lists.contents: Article 12 (Agree to use members' personal information)

wordArray.wordContents: The company collects and uses personal information with the consent of members. The specific processing procedure and contents related to this are in accordance with the company's personal information processing policy."""
The company uses the personal information of paragraph 1 for the purpose of fulfilling the Use Agreement and providing products under this Use Agreement.

The company may use personal information of some or all of members' to generate statistical data in connection with work, and may send cookies to the member's computer through the product. In this case, the member change the settings of your computer's browser to refuse to receive cookies or to warn you about the receipt of cookies. However, the personal information collected in this way is used only for overall statistical data."

The company can provide a variety of information that the member deems necessary while using the product to members by means of online announcement or email. However, members can opt out at any time via email."
The company may post advertisements on the product screen, homepage, email, etc. in relation to the operation of the product. Members who receive e-mails with advertisements can opt-out."
The company may limit or suspend all or part of the product in the following cases:

array.text: When a telecommunications business operator prescribed in the Telecommunications Business Act suspends telecommunication products
Due to construction, such as maintenance and regular maintenance of product facilities"
If there is a problem with the use of the product due to power outages, equipment failure, or congestion"
When there is a force majeure reason, such as a natural disaster or a national emergency"
When it is deemed necessary to discontinue the product for business, contract, or technical reasons."

wordArray.wordContents: In case of discontinuation of the product, the company notifies the member in advance by the method specified in Article 23 (Notification to Members). However, if it is impossible to notify in advance due to reasons beyond the company's control, it may be announced on the company's website afterwards."
The company is not responsible for the damages of members due to the temporary suspension of the provision of the product for the reason of paragraph 1.

array.text: VIRNECT products provide - AR real-time remote collaboration products, AR content production and distribution, AR information and data visualization, data-linked virtual monitoring and simulation systems, and all other augmented reality-based products."

wordArray.wordContents: The service fee is calculated and charged from the product subscription date according to the contract, regardless of whether or not the product is actually used."
Calculation of daily service fee is from 00:00 to 23:59 per day, and if the start time or end time of product delivery is in the middle of day 1, it is regarded as 1 day."
The monthly fee is charged starting from the subscription date, to one day before the next month of subscription date. (eg. 5th of June to 4th of July)"
The annual fee is calculated from the product subscription date to one day before the next year's subscription date, and the other conditions are the same as the monthly fee."

The company sends the receipt of the service fee or invoice to the member based on the application list. It is sent via mail, email, or other method operated by the payment agency when the company recieves the application from a user or before the product subscription begins."

Members are obliged to pay the first month's service fee prior to product subscription. The payment is possible through payment methods provided by the company such as wire transfer and credit card payments. However, some payment methods may be limited due to company circumstances."
The member's payment method can be done in one of the following ways.

array.text: Various bank transfers such as phone banking, internet banking, and mail banking"
Prepaid card, debit card, credit card, etc."
Wire Transfer
Payment by a voucher signed by the company or recognized by the company
Payment by other electronic payment methods

wordArray.wordContents: If there is a separate payment agency operating each payment method, the user must perform the procedures presented by the payment agency before using the payment method. When paying the company's product service fee, it is deemed to have agreed to the procedures and terms of use provided by the payment agency."

In the case of wire transfer payment method, the relevant amount must be deposited within one week of application. if the names of the user and the payer are different, the user must notify the company by phone, email or fax. The user bears all responsibility for not notifying to company."

Payment is confirmed within the business hours of the company (weekdays, Monday through Friday, 9:30 am to 6:30 pm), unless otherwise specified, and payment after the end of business is processed within the next business hours."
If payment is not confirmed within one week after application for use, the company may refuse to use of the product."
Members cannot resell products provided by the company to third parties unless when a separate contract is signed for resale purposes.
Members cannot transfer or give the right to use the product to others.
The company allows the member to use the product on the desired subscription date of the product, unless under special circumstances."

The company provides products 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, unless there is a business or technical problem. However, regular or irregular inspection times conducted to stabilize the product are excluded."

The company should immediately handle any opinions or complaints from members that are considered legitimate. However, if it is difficult to process immediately, the member must be notified of the reason and schedule by email or wire."

The company cannot distribute any members' information acquired through product servicing process to others without getting prior consent from the members. However, as long as it is in accordance with personal information processing policy (when requested by the relevant organizations for investigation purposes pursuant to related laws, upon request of the Information and Communication Ethics Committee, or to Credit information providers or credit information collection agencies regardless of payment default notice), it can be provided to a third party."
When applying for membership, the member must list all matters based on the facts, and cannot claim any rights when registering false or other information."
